title: Old Sarum Way Walking Route
description: This circular route takes you on tour through the river valleys, woodland and downland around Salisbury. There is some beautiful scenery to enjoy including views of the Rivers Avon, Ebble and Bourne.  You will also pass through a series of peaceful villages including South Newton, Alderbury, Burcombe, Downton, Durnford and Charlton with pretty thatched cottages and quaint pubs to enjoy.
